Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui.controllers.elements

Class CardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui.controllers.elements.CardController
public class CardController extends Object
Controller class for card assets in the Graphical User Interface.

      public CardController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Prepares the element for later use.

    • getImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getImage()
      Returns:
      The image currently displayed in this card.

    • setCardAndShowSide

      public void setCardAndShowSide(Card card, SideType side)
      Loads the card image for the specified card and side and inserts them in the GUI element.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be displayed.
      side - The requested side.

    • setCard

      public void setCard(Card card)
      Loads the image for both sides of the given card, without actually inserting it in the GUI element. Use showSide(it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.cards.SideType) to actually display a side of the card.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be displayed.

    • setCard

      public void setCard(PlayableCard card)
      Loads the image for both sides of the given playable card. Also extracts the card's cost. Like setCard(Card), this method does not insert the card image in the GUI element. Use showSide(it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.cards.SideType) to display a side of the card.
      Parameters:
      card - The playable card to be displayed.

    • showSide

      public void showSide(SideType side)
      Shows one side of the loaded card. If setCard(it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.cards.Card) was not called, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      side - The side to show.

    • toggleSide

      public void toggleSide()
      Toggles which side of the card is shown.

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean active)
      Sets whether this card is active. Only active cards can be dragged and display a shadow when hovered over.
      Parameters:
      active - The active flag.

    • updateActive

      public void updateActive()
      Updates the style classes on the cards after a change in the active flag.

    • setInteractable

      public void setInteractable(boolean interactable)
      Sets the style class for whether this card should have a hover shadow effect.
      Parameters:
      interactable - The interactable flag.

    • setSelected

      public void setSelected(boolean selected)
      Sets whether this card is selected. A card with the selected style class has a shadow effect.
      Parameters:
      selected - The selected flag.

    • updateCostSatisfied

      public void updateCostSatisfied(Map<ResourceType,Integer> resourceCounts)
      Updates whether this card should be active based on whether its cost is satisfied.
      Parameters:
      resourceCounts - A map containing the amount of every resource currently visible on the player's play area.

    • updateDisabled

      public void updateDisabled()
      Updates whether this card should be disabled. A disabled card is semi-transparent.

    • setTurnable

      public void setTurnable()
      Allows this card to be turned by clicking on it.

    • setShadowColor

      public void setShadowColor(ResourceType resourceType)
      Sets the color of the hover shadow for this card.
      Parameters:
      resourceType - The resource type of the card, which determines its color.

    • getRoot

      public javafx.scene.Parent getRoot()
      Returns:
      The root element of this card element.

    • getCard

      public Card getCard()
      Returns:
      Which card is displayed in this card GUI element.

    • setDraggable

      public void setDraggable(boolean isDraggable)
      Sets whether this card can be dragged.
      Parameters:
      isDraggable - Whether this card can be dragged.

    • setDrawType

      public void setDrawType(DrawType drawType)
      Sets the type of draw for this card. Should only be set for cards that are in the draw options.
      Parameters:
      drawType - The draw type for this card (one of the decks or one of the 4 common cards).

    • setDrawable

      public void setDrawable(boolean drawable)
      Sets whether this card is in the draw options.
      Parameters:
      drawable - Whether this card is in the draw options.
